metadata.title: CVE-2019-7338 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Self - Stored XSS exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attackerto execute HTML or JavaScript code in the view 'group' as it insecurelyprints the 'Group Name' value on the web page without applying any properfiltration.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
